actions.text: Amendment SA 805, under the order of 5/7/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 115.

Amendment SA 805 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 799. (consideration: CR S3218-3223, S3227; text: CR S3219) To protect the right of individuals to bear arms at water resources development projects administered by the Secretary of the Army.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 805, under the order of 5/7/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 115.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 805, under the order of 5/7/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 115.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 805 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 799.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To protect the right of individuals to bear arms at water resources development projects administered by the Secretary of the Army.
